name: Fast Fishing (itch)
description:
Fast Fishing tells the story of an anonymous fisherman in his relentless search for fluffy fish!

Features
  • Simple and fast: Straight to the point gameplay, with matches that can last just 10 seconds;
  • Endless: The fishes will never stop appearing until you let one of them pass;
  • Pleasant: Captivating sounds and visuals, with diverse effects;
  • Competitiveness: Challenge your friends to see who can catch the most fish.

Follow Kind Cat Games on Twitter to get known about future releases.
